sections.title: In this release
sections.markdown:
This publication has been discontinued as a result of the ONS Consultation on Statistical Products, 2013. The last edition of the Internet Access Quarterly Update was published on 14 May 2014, for Q1 2014. ONS will conduct a public consultation on future plans for the annual publication of estimates of Internet users and this will appear on the ONS public consultation page: [http://www.ons.gov.uk/ons/about-ons/get-involved/consultations/open-consultations/index.html](http://www.ons.gov.uk/ons/about-ons/get-involved/consultations/open-consultations/index.html "http://www.ons.gov.uk")

These National Statistics are produced to high professional standards and released according to the arrangements approved by the UK Statistics Authority.

description.title: Internet Access Quarterly Update
description.summary: Quarterly estimates of people who have ever or never used the Internet.
